Functions
displayTweets
function displayTweets(
topicId
)

Shows the tweets for the given topicId

Parameters
topicId

the topic id string for the tweets

Returns

None

See Also

Calls getTweetsByTopicId

_createTweetHTMLElement
function _createTweetHTMLElement(
id,
title,
content,
topicId
)

Creates an html element for a tweet. This should not be called outside of tweet-helper

Parameters
id

tweet id string

title

title string

content

tweet content string topicID topic id string

Returns

String that defines html elements.
